name: Automated
description:
Automated: This is a sci-fi fps parkour game that I have been working on for some months now and you can now play it. It really is currently just a demo, but if people want more gameplay, I may release a full game. However, for now, this is the final product.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Fire - Left mouse button
  • Crouch/slide - C/Left control
  • Sprint - Left shift
  • Dash - Q
  • Grapple - F
  • Wallrun - A/D when near a wall runnable wall

Features: There is a tutorial and 1 level, both with enemies and different challenges.
